reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress chic, comfortable, and great for summer wear, with one mentioning it's perfect for beach outings and parties. The fit receives positive feedback, with one customer noting it falls right at the calf. The material quality and stretchiness receive mixed reviews - while some praise the great fabric, others find it feels cheap, and while some describe it as super stretchy, others find it runs too large. Customers disagree on how see-through the dress is. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit well at 37 weeks prego
items.body: Wore this for my baby shower. Can wear in summer or winter. Wore with nude colored shapewear and a nude strapless bra and looked great. Bought a size small. I am 5’4 and approx. 145lbs in this photo (37 weeks prego). Very stretchy and comfortable. Hoping I can still wear it after this baby is out. Read more
items.author: Trisha

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, High Quality, and Affordable
items.body: I love this dress! So perfect for a nice summer dinner or beach outfit. Fabric is stretchy, soft, and extremely comfortable. Although a white knit, I didn’t find this dress to be see through at all. Dress is true to size- I am 5’3, around 120 lbs and ordered a S. Will definitely be purchasing other colors! Read more
items.author: Kari

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and Chic
items.body: I recently purchased the NUFIWI Women Summer Strapless Knitted Long Dress in size medium, and it has quickly become one of my favorite summer outfits! The off-shoulder design, combined with the stylish stripes and cutout details, makes for a stunning and eye-catching look. The bodycon fit and backless style enhance the overall elegance, making it perfect for beach outings and summer parties. The dress is incredibly comfortable to wear, thanks to its soft, breathable knitted fabric. However, it's worth noting that the material is a bit see-through. This isn't a deal-breaker for me, since I like to wear a body shaper under dresses, but it’s something to consider if you’re looking for more coverage. Overall, this dress is a fantastic addition to any summer wardrobe. It's stylish, comfortable, and perfect for making a statement at any sunny event. Highly recommended for those who love to embrace a chic, beachy vibe! Read more
items.author: Leah87

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute must buy
items.body: LOVE THIS DRESS!! I could have gotten smaller. Size down. Good stretch. I’m a medium I got small I could have even gotten smaller if wanted but the small did just fine. Super cute with sandals or even heels. Love this dress I don’t wear my dresses more them two times. I’ll be wearing this more Read more
items.author: I ordered 2 bags. I received one bag that had a opening. The other bag was never delivered. I had to wait super long for this delivery only to have this happen. I’ll just order from chewy.

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Terrible Fit
items.body: I wanted to love this dress but after i put it on, it was clear it was not even remotely what I expected. I bought a small and I'm 5'9", 130lbs, AA chest, 27 waist. This basically fell off of me. The fit was just so loose and unwearable. The material felt really cheap and was moderately thick. I don't know if I got sent a used or mistakenly marked size but it was just so bad. Read more
items.author: Ally_OnTheRoad

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars little big
items.body: really cute and comfy, super soft. got a small, usually a small sometimes a medium and it was a little big. very good quality thought. it’s not see through and it’s pretty thick. i think it was worth the money but i do wish i ordered an extra small Read more
items.author: Jenna C.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and chic
items.body: Very comfortable, soft material. Good amount of strength. Material not too thin, but I would recommend wearing a half slip or nude undergarments. I’m 5’0”, 150 lbs, ordered a size large. Fits great and falls right at my calf Read more
items.author: MReyes

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Size Down, but cute.
items.body: Definitely size down if you want to purchase this dress. Because it is knit stretchy fabric, it completely fell off of me. The material is a bit thick for outdoor summer events. But to go to dinner it would be cute. Quality is fantastic. Easily could be dressed up or dressed down and is not see through. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Off Shoulder is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Off Shoulder is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: A, C Striped Apricot, C Solid Red Pink, B Stripe 2, B Stripe 4, B Stripe 3, Black, C Solid White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
